snippet: President Obama defended his United Nations ambassador after three Republicans denounced her and called on Wednesday for a select committee to inquire into the attacks on the diplomatic compound in Benghazi, Libya.
abstract: President Obama defended his United Nations ambassador after three Republicans denounced her and called on Wednesday for a select committee to inquire into the attacks on the diplomatic compound in Benghazi, Libya.

headline.main: Obama Defends Susan Rice on Benghazi
